masterFinding.verificationInstructions:
Verification Instructions

Review server responses to identify sensitive data that should not be available to users.

Reporting Requirements
  1. Add an explanation what kind of data was identified in server responses

  2. Screenshot server response - redact sensitive data if needed
masterFinding.remediationInstructions: Ensure that sensitive information that users are not supposed to access is not returned in server responses.
masterFinding.name: Sensitive Information Disclosure - Server Response
masterFinding.businessImpact: An attacker could gain unauthorized access to sensitive data. This data could be used in potential attacks against the application.
masterFinding.description: Sensitive information was found in the server response. By looking at the raw response data, an attacker could see information that was not meant to be seen by users.
